scripts.flatten: truffle-flattener contracts/COINKToken.sol > flatten-contracts/COINKToken.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/COINKReferral.sol > flatten-contracts/COINKReferral.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/COINKMasterChef.sol > flatten-contracts/COINKMasterChef.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/COINKMasterChefV2.sol > flatten-contracts/COINKMasterChefV2.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/COINKLottery.sol > flatten-contracts/COINKLottery.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/Timelock.sol > flatten-contracts/Timelock.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/Multicall.sol > flatten-contracts/Multicall.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SmartChef.sol > flatten-contracts/SmartChef.sol && node flatten_fix.js
scripts.flatten-owner: truffle-flattener contracts/PiggybankoneFactory.sol > flatten-contracts/PiggybankoneFactory.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/PiggybankoneRouter.sol > flatten-contracts/PiggybankoneRouter.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/PiggybankoneProfile.sol > flatten-contracts/PiggybankoneProfile.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/PiggybankonePair.sol > flatten-contracts/PiggybankonePair.sol && node flatten_fix.js
